name: Sword of Sakura
description:
Trello: https://trello.com/b/M8LnAU6M/swordlidcloud

ESC: pásar leikinn

This is a game we had as a part of our game jam for our final collaborative project made with Solidclouds. In this game, you must obtain power-ups to be able to get to the final boss fight and save the world.

Scrum Master: Jón Ingi

Lead Artist: Hrefna Líf

Lead Programmer: Hrafnkell Orri

Main Game Designer: Hrafnkell Orri

Music: Jón Ingi

Decorating: Hrefna Líf
